thought.title: My List of Ideas for Personal Projects

childMdx.excerpt: Tags:  About Me Sorta Actively Working on (but not live yet) https://github.com/davidhorm/cookbook  - Display and scale ingredient amounts…

inboundReferences.previewMarkdown:
Tags: [About Me](/about-me)

## Sorta Actively Working on (but not live yet)

-   https://github.com/davidhorm/cookbook - Display and scale ingredient amounts directly in recipe. (not live yet)

## Took A Couple Steps

-   An app to compare two boardgames by looking at BGG ratings from only people that have rated both games.
    -   Was thinking about using GitHub Actions to scrape user ratings. https://github.com/davidhorm/bgg-scrape-ratings-action
-   An app to help generate an ad for a GeekList auction on [BGG](https://www.boardgamegeek.com/).
    -   https://github.com/davidhorm/bgg-auction-ad
-   How to do [Living Documentation](/living-documentation) with tools like Jest, Storybook, and Cypress.
    -   https://github.com/davidhorm/exploring-best-practices

## Shower Thoughts

-   What if User Story Mapping was organized Storybook to help with [Living Documentation](/living-documentation)? Maybe use PlantUML? https://github.com/plantuml/plantuml/issues/423
inboundReferences.previewHtml:
Tags: About Me

Sorta Actively Working on (but not live yet)

  • https://github.com/davidhorm/cookbook - Display and scale ingredient amounts directly in recipe. (not live yet)

Took A Couple Steps

  • An app to compare two boardgames by looking at BGG ratings from only people that have rated both games.
    • Was thinking about using GitHub Actions to scrape user ratings. https://github.com/davidhorm/bgg-scrape-ratings-action
  • An app to help generate an ad for a GeekList auction on BGG.
    • https://github.com/davidhorm/bgg-auction-ad
  • How to do Living Documentation with tools like Jest, Storybook, and Cypress.
    • https://github.com/davidhorm/exploring-best-practices

Shower Thoughts

  • What if User Story Mapping was organized Storybook to help with Living Documentation? Maybe use PlantUML? https://github.com/plantuml/plantuml/issues/423

childMdx.excerpt: Tags:  About Me Here's a list of personal projects: Continual Maintenance https://davidhorm.github.io/  - You are here. I'm thinking about…

inboundReferences.previewMarkdown:
Tags: [About Me](/about-me)

Here's a list of personal projects:

## Continual Maintenance

-   https://davidhorm.github.io/ - You are here. I'm thinking about jotting my learnings here.

## Done or Periodic Maintenance

-   https://davidhorm.github.io/sing-along/ - Display lyrics alongside (Xmas) music videos to sing-along to.
-   https://davidhorm.github.io/wavelength/ - Play Wavelength party game on web conference.
-   https://davidhorm.github.io/whats-my-word/ - Play What's My Word game on your phone.
-   https://davidhorm.github.io/slides/ - My presentations.

## Too lazy too maintain (for now)

-   https://davidhorm.github.io/xwing-dividers/ - Generate divider boxes to hold X-Wing Miniature Game pilot and upgrade cards
-   https://davidhorm.github.io/xwing-datatables/ - Displaying the data found in xwing-data in datatables for searching and filtering
-   https://github.com/davidhorm/household-chores - Manage Household Chores with GitHub project, and GitHub Actions automatically creating reoccurring chores.
inboundReferences.previewHtml:
Tags: About Me

Here's a list of personal projects:

Continual Maintenance

  • https://davidhorm.github.io/ - You are here. I'm thinking about jotting my learnings here.

Done or Periodic Maintenance

  • https://davidhorm.github.io/sing-along/ - Display lyrics alongside (Xmas) music videos to sing-along to.
  • https://davidhorm.github.io/wavelength/ - Play Wavelength party game on web conference.
  • https://davidhorm.github.io/whats-my-word/ - Play What's My Word game on your phone.
  • https://davidhorm.github.io/slides/ - My presentations.

Too lazy too maintain (for now)

  • https://davidhorm.github.io/xwing-dividers/ - Generate divider boxes to hold X-Wing Miniature Game pilot and upgrade cards
  • https://davidhorm.github.io/xwing-datatables/ - Displaying the data found in xwing-data in datatables for searching and filtering
  • https://github.com/davidhorm/household-chores - Manage Household Chores with GitHub project, and GitHub Actions automatically creating reoccurring chores.
